ygData.subject: RGB version of picbreeder?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Ken, Have you considered this?  Why did you go with a single dimension of output? I imagine that with the monochromatic version, it s easier to obtain

Subject: RGB version of picbreeder?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=32323338; y=6_ZpPNeedM38vwMfZPEnW0R7bVMzzteeyw2PTxUMtmlPbmr0xA

Hi Ken,

Have you considered this?  Why did you go with a single dimension of  
output?

I imagine that with the monochromatic version, it's easier to obtain  
recognizable objects, because we are focussed primarily on shapes and  
shading (depth).  But in RGB I bet it would be harder to obtain  
recognizable objects because while we might obtain the right shapes,  
the colors would seem odd.  However, I'm also betting that we could  
come up with some pretty interesting artwork this way.
--
Stephen Waits
steve@...
